Name: Geometry Rush
About the game: It is a game for hardcore players where you have to flip, spin and dodge to achieve the highest score possible. Though the idea of the game is simple and avoid obstacles level, it is actually more difficult than that, only the fittest players succeed in getting away in this addictive game. Features: ■ Classic and Infinity level ! ■ Progressive level and speed in the game ! ■ Good animation effect ! ■ Good music !
